# Buoyant (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 137

No matter how hard you try, you cannot be submerged in any kind of liquid. With a successful [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] check of DC 10 (calm water), DC 15 (slowly moving water) or DC 20 (fast or rough water) you can walk on water as if moving through difficult terrain.
